== Count the files and folders in a directory ==
{{{bash 
tree			# this will get all the files and folders
tree | wc -l		# thsi will count the files as well
}}}

* the code below can be added inside the vim app to grep the file name inside 
  the " and open in it in the pdf viewer beside the app (disown) 
{{{bash
map <leader>p 0yi" :!open <C-R>" & disown<CR><CR>
}}}

* The code below is for finding all the pdf files and do a convert to text
{{{bash
for file in *.pdf; do pdftotext $file ;done
}}}


==Key bindings for the terminal==
{{{
ctl + U - delete from the cursor to the start of the line.
ctl + K - delete from the cursor to the end of the line.
ctl + W - delete from the cursor to the start of the preceding word
ctl + D - delete from the cursor to the end of the next word.
ctl + L - clear window
}}}
